DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of topical AS101 as treatment for Female Androgenetic Alopecia (FAGA) in menopause women.
DOC.brief_title: Topical AS101 for Treatment of FAGA (Female Androgenetic Alopecia) in Menopause Women
DOC.criteria: Women in menopause, over 50 years of age. Clinically diagnosed for AGA, according to Ludwig scale III. Women treated with chronic medications. Use of Minoxidil within 3 months prior to entering study. Women who have underwent hair transplantation. Use of drugs with androgenic or antiandrogenic effects. Any other type of hair loss.
